accountPage.subTitle: Required fields are marked with an asterisk. All information submitted here is private.
accountPage.title: Account

adminDashboard.hint1: Did you know callouts can be created without an end date, and just keep running? See our feature showcase for more information.
adminDashboard.hint2: Find out more about the beabee vision around community engagement and meaningful relationships with your audience.
adminDashboard.hint3: Our FAQ addresses common questions about getting started and use cases. If the answer you're looking for isn't there, get in touch.
adminDashboard.joinSlack: Join the beabee community on Slack!
adminDashboard.responsesSoFar: {n} response so far | {n} responses so far
adminDashboard.supportInbox: Need help? Please visit the beabee Help Center or use our support inbox: support{'@'}beabee.io

email.label: Email
email.text: All email communication with your members will be sent from this email address.
email.title: Set a general email for member support

footer.text: These links appear in beabee's footer and in emails
footer.title: Footer

socialSharing.text: Configure what appears on social media when a link to your beabee community is shared
socialSharing.title: Social sharing

theme.fontNotListed: Don't see your font listed? Contact support{'@'}beabee.io to get it added.
theme.label: Theme

advancedSearch.noNestedRules: This filter contains nested rules which cannot be edited using the advanced serach editor.

createOrUpdate.label: Do you want to create a new segment?

saveSegment.text: A segment is a group of contacts that matches a set of filters, like the ones you've just created. New contacts that match these filters are automatically added to the segment.
saveSegment.title: Save segment

form.guestFieldsMissing: Please tell us your contact details
form.name: Your name
form.submittingResponseError: There was a problem submitting your response, please try again

callout.membersOnly: This callout is open to members only. To participate

share.address: Share this callout with the following address:
share.services: Or quickly share using one of these services:

callout.showingPreview: Response submission is disabled in preview mode
callout.youResponded: You replied to this callout â™¥

confirmDelete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this callout?

calloutAdminOverview.created: Your new callout was successfully created.

annotation.copy: All information added in this section is visible for admins only. Members will never see these in their profile or member area.

security.title: Security
security.whatDoTheButtonsDo: Click the button to generate an emergency link:

contacts.editNotice: Updating a contact's contribution is currently only possible for those with a manual contribution.

contribution.cancelDescription: If you cancel your contribution your membership will finish at the end of your current payment cycle, {day} of {month}.
contribution.cancelMessage: We're sorry to see you go.
contribution.changeBank: Change to a different bank account
contribution.changeBankInfo: You'll be asked for the details of your new bank account in the next step.
contribution.contributionUpdateError: You can't update your contribution at the moment as you have a payment pending
contribution.dueToRenew: Your contribution is due to renew on {renewalDate}.
contribution.expiredText: Please consider renewing, even if at the lowest amount it would help us immensely. Thank you!
contribution.hasPendingPayment: Your payment is currently being processed.
contribution.manualPayment: You are paying manually through bank transfer right now. To make it easier for you to manage your contribution and easier for us to know on how much money from our members we can rely on month on month, please update to paying automatically via direct debit.
contribution.nextAmountChanging: Your contribution will change to {nextAmount} on {renewalDate}.

paymentHistory.empty: Past payments and their invoices will show up here.
paymentHistory.title: Payment history

contribution.paymentSourceUpdateError: You can't update your bank account at the moment as you have a payment pending
contribution.prorateDecreaseMessage: You have {monthsLeft} {months} left on your current contribution, your new contribution will start on {renewalDate}.
contribution.prorateIncreaseMessage: You have {monthsLeft} {months} left on your current contribution. You can make a one-off payment of {oneOffPayment} to start your new contribution immediately.
contribution.prorateNoText: You'll stay on your current contribution until then.
contribution.prorateYesText: You'll be charged a one-off payment of {oneOffPayment} now and your contribution will be updated immedately
contribution.updatedPaymentSource: Your payment method has been updated.
contribution.willRenew: Your contribution will automatically renew on {renewalDate}.
contribution.willRenewWithNewAmount: Your contribution will automatically renew on {renewalDate} and will change to your chosen amount of {nextAmount}.

content.description: Build your callout with questions and prompts

intro.help: The Introduction text appears alongside the callout. It should explain why you are doing this callout and give any context the user might need before answering.
intro.label: Introduction text

content.title: Callout content

dates.description: Schedule when your callout will go live and for how long
dates.title: Dates and duration

endMessage.description: Set a final thank you message or page to redirect to

action.label: When the user finishes answering the callout

text.help: Here you can thank users in more detail and let them know when to expect updates or follow-ups.
text.label: Thank you text
text.placeholder: Include more details about how valuable their input was...

title.help: You readers will see the Thank you title when they finish answering the callout.
title.label: Thank you title

url.help: This could be your homepage or a first article about the topic of the callout.
url.label: URL for redirect

endMessage.title: End message

titleAndImage.description: Set a title, description and image for the callout

description.help: The Short description expands on the title to explain what the callout is about. It is meant to inform people what is inside in a few words.
description.label: Short description
description.placeholder: Quickly explain why people should open this callout.

image.help: The Cover image will serve as an illustration for the callout on menus and forms.
image.label: Cover image

overrideShare.label: Use callout title and description for sharing?

opts.no: No, set a custom title and description

shareDescription.help: The Share description field sets the short description as it should appear on social media cards.
shareDescription.label: Share description
shareDescription.placeholder: Quickly explain why people should respond to this callout.

shareTitle.help: The Share title field sets the title as it should appear on social media cards.
shareTitle.label: Share title

slug.help: You can share the Permalink with users so they can access the callout
slug.label: Permalink

title.help: The Title will appear on all the mentions of this callout. It's worth spending a while coming up with the right name to get people interested.
title.label: Title

titleAndImage.title: Title and image

visibility.description: Choose who will see your callout

anonymous.help: If you allow anonymous responses, guests will not be asked for their contact information.
anonymous.label: Should guests be able to answer anonymously?

opts.yes: Yes, contact info is not needed

editable.help: If yes, the users will be able to update their answers until the callout reaches its end date.
editable.label: Should people be able to change their answers before the callout ends?

visible.help: You can make the callout not appear to users if you only want it to be answered by people who you share the link with.
visible.label: Should it be visible in the users' dashboards?

opts.no: No, it can only be accessed through its link

who.help: Callouts can be presented to Everyone or restricted to Members only participation
who.label: Who can take part?

visibility.title: Visibility settings

editCallout.replicated: Your callout was successfully replicated, and you are now editing the new copy. Be sure to edit the title in the "Title and Image" tab.
editCallout.title: Edit: {title}
editCallout.warning: Careful! You are editing a live callout. Changing form properties carries the risk of rendering previous answers unusable.

forgotPassword.checkInbox: Please check your inbox and follow the instructions in the email. Check your spam folder if it doesn't appear.
forgotPassword.description: Please enter your email address and weâ€™ll send you password reset instructions.
forgotPassword.message: If there is an account associated with {email}, you will receive an email shortly.
forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?

errorMessages.aggregatorTop: Something is missing. Please check for errors below.
errorMessages.generic: Oops, something went wrong! Contact support if this happens again.
errorMessages.validation: Something is missing. Please check the fields above.

address.required: This field is required if you want to add an address

unknown.min: This field must be at least {min}

form.passwordInfo: Set a secure password: 8+ characters or longer, and it must include a number, uppercase and lowercase letters.
form.warning: You should get the user's consent before making updates to this page. All changes you make here will also be visible to the user.

join.absorbFeeText: Our payment processor charges us per transaction which means we receive less from monthly contributions. Are you happy to absorb the {fee} transaction fee?  Alternatively you could pay annually.

confirmEmail.message: Almost there! We just need to confirm your email address to finish setting up your membership.
confirmEmail.proceed: We've sent you an email. Please click the link to proceed.
confirmEmail.title: Confirm your email address

duplicateEmail.message: This email address is already registered. You can login to proceed.
duplicateEmail.title: Duplicate email address

failed.message: There was a problem setting up your membership, our team has been notified. Please contact support if the problem persists.
failed.title: Something went wrong

join.noContribution: I don't want to contribute right now
join.notice: By proceeding you are accepting the

joinPayment.genericError: Oops, something went wrong! Contact support if this happens again.
joinPayment.note: You'll be able to modify your contribution and access your payment history at any time in your member account

accountConfirmation.text: After joining, users will be asked to confirm their registration. Here you can set the details of the confirmation screen.
accountConfirmation.title: Account confirmation

emails.description: Customise your welcome and cancellation emails
emails.text: All emails are sent from your support email address and include standard signature, you can change these in your email settings.
emails.title: Emails

intro.description: Say hello to your new members
intro.text: Once your members are done with registration, they'll be greeted with a message. Make it yours!
intro.title: Welcome message

joinForm.description: Fine tune your membership join form
joinForm.text: In this section you can edit, fine tune and preview your membership join form.
joinForm.title: Join form

notFound.text: This page doesn't exist. If you think this is a mistake please contact {support}.
